quote: The night is just a part of the day
author: Paulo Coelho,  Brida

quote: Night is certainly more novel and less profane than day.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: I like the night. Without the dark, we'd never see the stars.
author: Stephenie Meyer,  Twilight

quote: Who said nights were for sleep?
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Day or night, good or bad…all things from within.
author: T.F. Hodge,  From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: Summer night--even the starsare whispering to each other.
author: Kobayashi Issa

quote: The night is still waiting.
author: Dejan Stojanovic,  Circling: 1978-1987

quote: In the dark I rest,unready for the light which dawnsday after day,eager to be shared.Black silk, shelter me.I needmore of the night before I openeyes and heartto illumination. I must stillgrow in the dark like a rootnot ready, not ready at all.
author: Denise Levertov

quote: Night always turns to day again as long as the sun shall rise, so shall it be for darkened dreams grown pale from compromise
author: Tracy L. Conway,  I Wandered from New Orleans: Poems from the South

quote: Night is a time of rigor, but also of mercy. There are truths which one can see only when it’s dark
author: Isaac Bashevis Singer,  Teibele And Her Demon

quote: At two o'clock in the morning, if you open your window and listen,You will hear the feet of the Wind that is going to call the sun.And the trees in the Shadow rustle and the trees in the moonlight glisten,And though it is deep, dark night, you feel that the night is done.
author: Rudyard Kipling

quote: Goodnight stars, goodnight air, goodnight noises everywhere.
author: Margaret Wise Brown,  Goodnight Moon

quote: Do not go gentle into that good night.Rage, rage against the dying of the light.
author: Dylan Thomas,  In Country Sleep, and Other Poems

quote: In the morning there is meaning, in the evening there is feeling.
author: Gertrude Stein,  Tender Buttons

quote: Life is grace. Sleep is forgiveness. The night absolves. Darkness wipes the slate clean, not spotless to be sure, but clean enough for another day's chalking.
author: Frederick Buechner,  The Alphabet of Grace

quote: To dream by night is to escape your life. To dream by day is to make it happen.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: A day without sunshine is like, you know, night.
author: Steve Martin

quote: All days are nights to see till I see thee, And nights bright days when dreams do show thee me.
author: William Shakespeare,  Shakespeare's Sonnets

quote: When in darkness....strike a match
author: John Paul Warren

quote: The warrior of the night is a wondrous soul.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: And to 'scape stormy days, I choose an everlasting night.
author: John Donne,  The Complete English Poems

quote: Good night, good night! parting is such sweet sorrow, That I shall say good night till it be morrow.
author: William Shakespeare,  Romeo and Juliet

quote: Tonight’s December thirty-first,Something is about to burst.The clock is crouching, dark and small,Like a time bomb in the hall.Hark, it's midnight, children dear.Duck! Here comes another year!
author: Ogden Nash,  Collected verse from 1929 on

quote: There have been bleak nights along my way, many of my own making, but life is all the brighter for them now. To the human eye, without the darkness there are no stars.
author: Sumangali Morhall,  Auspicious Good Fortune: One woman's inspirational journey from Western disillusionment to Eastern spiritual fulfilment

quote: At night, when the objective world has slunk back into its cavern and left dreamers to their own, there come inspirations and capabilities impossible at any less magical and quiet hour. No one knows whether or not he is a writer unless he has tried writing at night.
author: H.P. Lovecraft

quote: Let us step into the night and pursue that flighty temptress, adventure.
author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

quote: Waking At NightThe blue river is grey at morningand evening. There is twilightat dawn and dusk. I lie in the darkwondering if this quiet in me nowis a beginning or an end.
author: Jack Gilbert,  The Dance Most of All: Poems

quote: Glow in the Dark "You've led me from stark nightwith a love that glows in the dark.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: All day and all night my desire for you unwinds like a poisonous snake.
author: Samar Sen

quote: Dawn is meant for Lovers. And so is dusk and anytime in between. Count me in. And out. In, out, in, out, and I just came, I saw, I conked out.-Amanda Mosher and Jarod Kintz
author: Amanda Mosher,  liQUID PROse QUOtes

quote: Only that day dawns to which we are awake. There is more day to dawn. The sun is but a morning star.
author: Henry David Thoreau,  Walden

quote: There are hours for rest, and hours for wakefulness; nights for sobriety and nights for drunkenness—(if only so that possession of the former allows us to discern the latter when we have it; for sad as it is, no human body can be happily drunk all the time).
author: Roman Payne,  Rooftop Soliloquy

quote: Even the darkest night will end and the sun will rise.
author: Victor Hugo,  Les Misérables

quote: Morning without you is a dwindled dawn.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: It’s dark now and I am very tired. I love you, always. Time is nothing.
author: Audrey Niffenegger,  The Time Traveler's Wife

quote: Love me like a wrong turn on a bad roadlate at night.
author: Kim Addonizio

quote: Why can you see the stars at night, but not the light...
author: A. Witness,  The Adventures of Zac Master: The Light

quote: My reality is it’s nighttime. The truth is I’m just blindfolded. How many people live like me, in self-deluded darkness?
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: Night clubs are where Americans learn the laws of motion.
author: Bauvard,  Some Inspiration for the Overenthusiastic

quote: I’m a powerful being. I caused the night to turn into day. And I didn’t even try! I simply waited. I’ll bet I could even do it in my sleep.
author: Jarod Kintz,  $3.33

quote: All I know is a door into the dark
author: Seamus Heaney

quote: Midnight is Hellen-Kelleresque, so if you ask me if I’m seeing anybody, I’ll ask you what time it is. Answers are always between 12:01 AM to 11:59 PM.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: I have loved the stars too fondly to be fearful of the night.
author: Sarah Williams

quote: Through endless night the earth whirls toward a creation unknown...
author: Henry Miller,  Tropic of Cancer

quote: I don't dream at night, I dream at day, I dream all day; I'm dreaming for living.
author: Steven Spielberg

quote: Tonight is For the Dying I've seen it grow dark ten-thousand times, yet never once mourned the loss of light, until tonight. Tonight I'm dying, dying, dying; before morn I may be ash in an urn, I know the light will return, maybe keeping ablaze its promise to others. Maybe not.If I had my druthers, the others would bedying, dying, dying, too,tonight.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: Do not go gentle into that good night,Old age should burn and rave at close of day;Rage, rage against the dying of the light.
author: Dylan Thomas,  Do Not Go Gentle Into That Good Night

quote: I'm an insomniac, my mind works the night shift.
author: Pete Wentz,  Gray

quote: Friendship is the shadow of the evening, which increases with the setting sun of life.
author: Jean de La Fontaine

quote: The dawn is not distant, nor is the night starless; love is eternal.
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow
